name: Kibou
description:
Play as Kibou, a lonely and colorless orphan child in a world full of colors.

Tired of being alone and sad, you decide to wander into a forest. You encounter an evil demon, that came to bargain: He offers you the brightest of colors, but it comes with a twist. Ignoring the conditions, you immediately accept, and find yourself back in the village. Your wish has been fulfilled, but every villager lost his color in the process! Can you restore the villagers colors?

Kibou is a game where your goal is to restore the colors of the different villagers. As you walk through the village, you will notice NPCs that have tasks for you. Complete the tasks, and you will restore the color of the given villager. But remember! Every villager has a specific color code (green = correct, red = wrong, purple = confused), and you will need to solve the task according to that color. Watch out for instructions in the top left corner!
